content:
Sure, here's a table with the figures and their appearances in African geomancy (using full black circles or squares), along with their corresponding names in Oriental and Occidental geomancy practices and brief interpretations:

| African Geomancy | Oriental Geomancy | Occidental Geomancy | Interpretation |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Oyeku | Qīan (乾) | Populus | Creative force, strength, clarity, heaven, masculinity |
| Iwori | Dùn (遁) | Via | Sudden changes, transformation, death, secrets, hidden knowledge |
| Odi | Rén (壬) | Carcer | Change, growth, transformation, success, progress |
| Irosun | Jǐng (井) | Fortuna Minor | Hidden talents, inner strength, perseverance, success |
| Owonrin | Guā (坤) | Terra | Mother Earth, nurturing, fertility, femininity, grounding |
| Obara | Kǎn (坎) | Aquarius | Emotional depth, intuition, creativity, fluidity |
| Okanran | Gèn (艮) | Aries | Patience, perseverance, strength, obstacles, mountains |
| Ogunda | Zhèn (震) | Capricornus | Communication, movement, thunder, inspiration, awakening |
| Osa | Kūn (坤) | Cancer | Rest, reflection, nurturing, motherly love, introspection |
| Ika | Lí (离) | Leo | Energy, passion, creativity, warmth, expression |
| Oturupon | Xùn (巽) | Gemini | Change, communication, creativity, adaptability, flexibility |
| Otura | Kǎn (坎) | Pisces | Intuition, dreams, divination, emotional depth, fluidity |
| Irete | Gèn (艮) | Taurus | Growth, stability, perseverance, grounding, determination |
| Ose | Duì (兑) | Libra | Harmony, balance, partnership, relationships, diplomacy |
| Ofun | Kūn (坤) | Scorpio | Completion, transformation, cycles, rebirth, regeneration |

Note: The correspondences with Oriental and Occidental geomancy practices are based on general associations and may vary depending on the tradition or interpretation. The interpretations provided are also brief and simplified, and there are many more nuances and variations to each figure's meaning in different contexts.
